text: The 1998/99 NTFL season was the 78th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). Waratah have won there 14th premiership title while defeating St Marys in the grand final by 66 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Waratah | 19.13 (127) - 8.13 (61) | St Marys |} ==References== Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1998–99 NTFL season
